title: Product card UI updates: icon-only cart, filter page, recently viewed, shimmering gold border

requirements.text: Remove the 'Add to Cart' text label from all product card and product detail page cart buttons across the entire app (including MasonryProductGrid, CategoryProductRow, NewArrivalsSection, ProductDetailPage, CategoryPageTemplate, and any other component rendering an add-to-cart button). Keep only the cart icon visible inside the button. Ensure button sizing and alignment remain consistent after the label is removed.

quotes: Remove the Add to Cart label across all product pages/cards; keep only the cart icon.

acceptanceCriteria: No 'Add to Cart' text appears on any product card throughout the app
Cart icon remains visible and functional on all product cards and detail pages
Button click still triggers add-to-cart behaviour
Button layout is not broken after label removal

requirements.text: Replace the visible filter bar/dropdowns in product category pages (CategoryPageTemplate and ProductFilterBar usage) with a single filter icon button. When the filter icon is clicked, open a dedicated full-page or full-screen filter panel/page that contains all filter options (metal type, price range, occasion, sort order). The selected filter state must remain synchronised with the product listing: applying or clearing filters on the filter page must immediately update the displayed products when the user returns to or closes the filter panel.

quotes: Filter and Navigation: Show only a filter icon; clicking it opens a dedicated filter page/panel with all filters, fully synchronized with the product listing.

acceptanceCriteria: Only a filter icon button is shown in the navigation/header area of category/product listing pages — no inline dropdowns are visible by default
Clicking the filter icon opens a full-screen or overlay filter page/panel
All existing filter options (metal type, price range, occasion, sort order) are available inside the filter panel
Active filter count badge is shown on the filter icon when filters are applied
Product listing updates to reflect selected filters when filters are applied
A clear-all or reset option is available inside the filter panel
Filter panel can be closed/dismissed to return to the product listing

requirements.text: On the main HomePage (frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx), after all product category carousel sections are rendered, remove any statically listed product grid. Replace that section with a 'Recently Viewed' section that shows products the current customer has recently viewed. Track product views in local/session storage (since backend persistence is not required for browsing history). Display the section with a visible label such as 'Recently Viewed' and render the products as horizontal scrollable product cards. If no products have been viewed, hide the section entirely.

quotes: Home Page – Product Listing: After all product category carousels, replace any static listed products with a Recently Viewed section showing products recently seen by customers, with an appropriate label.

acceptanceCriteria: The static product grid/listing after category carousels on the HomePage is removed
A 'Recently Viewed' section with a visible heading label appears after the carousels
Products the user has clicked on or navigated to are tracked and shown in this section
Products are displayed in a horizontally scrollable card row
If no products have been viewed, the section is not rendered
The most recently viewed product appears first

requirements.text: Add a subtle off-white border with a shimmering gold animation to every product card across the entire app. This includes cards in MasonryProductGrid, CategoryProductRow, NewArrivalsSection, and any other location where product cards are rendered. Implement the shimmer as a CSS keyframe animation that creates a gentle pulsing or sweeping gold glow/border effect. The border should be thin (1–2px), off-white in its base state, and animate to a gold shimmer continuously. Add the shared animation styles to the global stylesheet (frontend/src/index.css) and apply the class to all product card root elements.

quotes: all the product cards across the app will have small off-white border with shimmering gold animation
Every product card across the entire app will have a subtle off-white border with a shimmering gold animation - not just New Launches.

acceptanceCriteria: Every product card in the app has a thin off-white border visible at rest
The border animates with a shimmering gold effect continuously
The animation is present on cards in MasonryProductGrid, CategoryProductRow, NewArrivalsSection, and all other card components
The shimmer animation is defined as a CSS keyframe in the global stylesheet and reused via a shared class
The animation is subtle and does not interfere with card readability or hover interactions

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
Do not change the backend schema or Motoko actor
Recently Viewed tracking must use client-side storage only (localStorage or sessionStorage) — no backend changes required
The shimmering gold border animation must use existing brand gold color tokens from the Tailwind config and index.css
nonGoals: QR code feature — explicitly removed from scope by the user
Backend persistence for recently viewed products
Any changes to authentication or checkout flow
Adding new product categories or backend data
